title: LinkedIn Profile Scraper Input
description: Configuration for scraping LinkedIn profiles from Google search results

profession.title: Profession/Job Title
profession.description: The profession or job title to search for (e.g., 'software engineer', 'marketing manager')

country.title: Country
country.description: The country to search for profiles in (e.g., 'United States', 'Canada', 'United Kingdom')

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of Google search result pages to crawl

delayMs.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayMs.description: Delay in milliseconds between each page request to avoid being blocked

apifyProxyGroups.title: Proxy Groups
apifyProxyGroups.description: Which Apify proxy groups to use
